home: Hello there, hope you are having a great day. I am Ashish Karn and this is the landing page for any information you want about me. I am a software professional and I love to code and learn new technologies..and, obviously, to implement them too. I started my career as a Java developer and currenlty I am a full stack developer. I hail from a small town in Bihar. I did my graduation from WBUT (Netaji Subhash Engineering College) in Electronics and Communication Engineering. I got my first Job in Tata Consultancy Services and started my career with the IT giant.
